title: Suma Chakrabarti - Wikipedia
snippet: Chakrabarti was born in 1959 in Jalpaiguri, West Bengal, India. He was educated at City of London School; New College, Oxford (BA in Philosophy, Politics, and Economics); and the University of Sussex (MA in Development Economics).

title: Suma Chakrabarti | World Bank Live
snippet: After studying Politics, Philosophy and Economics at the University of Oxford, Sir Suma took a Masters in Development Economics at the University of Sussex. He holds honorary doctorates from the Universities of Sussex and East Anglia, as well ...

title: Suma Chakrabarti
snippet: After studying Politics, Philosophy and Economics at the University of Oxford, Sir Suma took a Masters in Development Economics at the University of Sussex.

title: ‘The British civil service is much more open to people from a different national origin’ - Telegraph India
snippet: Then 10 years old, Chakrabarti was admitted to St Xavier’s School, but was unable to attend classes even for a single day “because there was a Naxalite rebellion going on,” he dimly remembers.
